number one : then if its noted it will be 1000 (for example) so the unnoted will be 1 less so 999
dunno what number wizzy g hat is but decrease it with 1

number two : u need to add more else u can’t do it rarer
so if u want not much boots and much dhide then add 2 boots and 10 dhide for example

item.title: Req: Another 2 smart questions
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[u]number one:

how can i fix noted items such as wizard robe top (g) to bank in normal form? because when i bank it, it stays as a note

[u]Number two:

ive set items like this…

[code]public static int Ring[] = {6737,6735,6733,6731};

public static int Ring()
{
	return Ring[(int)(Math.random()*Ring.length)];
}

}[/code]

in item2.java

but how do i make the drops rarer?

like ive made a treasure trial one and i want the zammy and sara wizzards to drop d’hide more often than ranger boots, but i dont want to add like 10 of same code like 6666,6666,6666,6666,1111,6666

i just wanna make it more rarer :s

help please![br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 05:01:13 AM[/size][hr]anyone know?
